document_data.name: Barzan al-Hiyali
document_data.mainbody: '''Barzan al-Hiyali''' served as captain-general of [[Krak al-Niraan]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Personality: Barzan was a greedy middle-aged man who desired the command of a large army. He did actually care for the soldiers under his command at the keep.
document_data.Activities: Barazan recognized the military genius of [[Khaizuran]], a [[warmonger genie]], though he secretly detested him.
document_data.History: In order to protect the honor of his family, Barzan staged his own death in [[Hiyal]] once it was discovered that he took bribes. He allied himself with the [[Brotherhood of the True Flame]] out of desperation after leaving Hiyal.
document_data.Possessions:
Barzan owned a magical shield and [[longsword]], a set of ''[[armor of the desert evening]]'',
and a few ''[[potion of healing|healing potions]]''.
